title: CLEO Projects Registry Schema
description: Unified global registry tracking all CLEO-initialized projects. Single source of truth for both project management and Nexus cross-project coordination.

lastUpdated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last registry modification.

projects.description: Hash-keyed project entries. Hash is 12-char hex SHA-256 prefix of absolute project path.

projectEntry.description: Individual project registration record with metadata and optional Nexus fields.

hash.description: Unique 12-character hex hash derived from absolute project path (SHA-256 prefix). MUST match parent key.

path.description: Absolute file system path to project root. MUST be unique across all projects.

name.description: Human-readable project name (typically basename of path).

registeredAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when project was first registered (cleo init).

lastSeen.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last CLEO operation in this project.

healthStatus.description: Overall project health status. Defaults to 'unknown' if not yet checked.

healthLastCheck.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last health check. Null if never checked.

permissions.description: Nexus cross-project permission level. Defaults to 'read'.

taskCount.description: Number of tasks in project. Cached for quick reference.

labels.description: Unique labels across all tasks in the project.

lastSync.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last Nexus sync. Null if never synced.
